title: Kannil Anbai Solvale Lyrics From Eesan Movie
stanzas:
Kannil anbai solvaalae
yaarum illai ivalpolae.
thunban ennai theendaamal
thaayaai kaappaal manmaele.(2)

sila neram punnagaiyaale
pookkal thandhiduvaal.
sila neram sandhaigalaale
ennai vendriduvaal.

pesaamal mounathinaale
manathai solliduvaal.
ival sondham podhum
ennum ennam thandhiduvaal.

Kannil anbai solvaalae
yaarum illai ivalpolae.
thunban ennai theendaamal
thaayaai kaappaal manmaele.

Ulagam endhan ulagam
engum ivale vandhiduvaal.
uyaram konjam valarndhapodhum
kuzhandhai endriduvaal.

ullangaiyil paasam vaithu
unavai thandhiduvaal.
urangumpodhum urangaamal
en arugil nindriduvaal.

ival pole ivalai pole
vazhvil nanbargal illai.
maru jenmam vandhaal kooda
naanthan ivalin pillai.

Kannil anbai solvaalae
yaarum illai ivalpolae.
thunban ennai theendaamal
thaayaai kaappaal manmaele.

kanneer thuligal vendum
endru kannai ketkindren
kanneer thudaika ivalum
vandhal thinamum azhukindren.

ennai naane kaanbadhupole
ivalai paarkindren.
endrum engum vazhithunaiyaaga
ivalai kaetkindren.

uravennum varthaikkuthaan
artham indru kanden.
ival anbin velicham munne
iravum pagalthaan enbaen.

Kannil anbai solvaalae
yaarum illai ivalpolae.
thunban ennai theendaamal
thaayaai kaappaal manmaele.

sila neram punnagaiyaale
pookkal thandhiduvaal.
sila neram sandhaigalaale
ennai vendriduvaal.

pesaamal mounathinaale
manathai solliduvaal.
ival sondham podhum
ennum ennam thandhiduvaal.

Kannil anbai solvaalae
yaarum illai ivalpolae.
thunban ennai theendaamal
thaayaai kaappaal manmaele.

seo.title: Kannil Anbai Solvale Lyrics From Eesan Movie
seo.description: Get the complete Kannil Anbai Solvale Lyrics From Eesan Movie from Eesan. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by James Vasanthan and sung by Padmanabhan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Eesan, James Vasanthan, Padmanabhan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
